channel.title: Conversational Ai on fahrizain
channel.description: Recent content in Conversational Ai on fahrizain

item.title: Building Conversational AI with LangChain Part 2: Chat with Your Data
item.description: LLM is powerful, but it cannot answer questions it doesn’t know before. Thanks to RAG we can inject some knowledge to extend LLM capability. Now let’s build our first RAG!

item.title: Building Conversational AI with LangChain: Techniques for Context Retention in Chatbots
item.description: We moved from in-house training model to hosted models and ready-to-use APIs. With the existence of free LLM APIs, let’s explore how to create our own free chatbot!
